scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm version major && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:premajor: npm run build && npm version premajor && npm publish
scripts.publish:preminor: npm run build && npm version preminor && npm publish
scripts.publish:prepatch: npm run build && npm version prepatch && npm publish
scripts.publish:prerelease: npm run build && npm version prerelease && npm publish
